Name: ligand_asym_id
Description: Ligand chain asymmetric id

Name: ligand_auth_id
Description: Ligand chain author id

Name: ligand_ccd_code
Description: Ligand Chemical Component Dictionary (CCD) code

Name: ligand_centroid
Description: Ligand center of geometry

Name: ligand_covalent_linkages
Description: Ligand covalent linkages as described in https://mmcif.wwpdb.org/dictionaries/mmcif_pdbx_v50.dic/Categories/struct_conn.html with _struct_conn.conn_type_id == 'covale'

Name: ligand_crippen_clogp
Description: Ligand Crippen MlogP. See https://www.rdkit.org/docs/source/rdkit.Chem.Crippen.html

Name: ligand_id
Description: The "__"-separated string of pdb_id, biounit_id, instance_chain

Name: ligand_in_artifact_list
Description: Boolean indicating whether ligand CCD code is in a pre-defined list of artifact.

Name: ligand_instance
Description: Ligand instance number after constituting the bio-assembly

Name: ligand_interacting_ligand_chains
Description: RSCB chain asymmetric ids of ligand residues interacting with a given ligand

Name: ligand_interacting_ligand_chains_BIRD
Description: BORD ids of ligand residues interacting with a given ligand.

Name: ligand_interacting_ligand_chains_ECOD
Description: ECOD tnames of ligand residues interacting with a given ligand.

Name: ligand_interacting_ligand_chains_PANTHER
Description: PANTHER ids of ligand residues interacting with a given ligand.

Name: ligand_interacting_ligand_chains_Pfam
Description: Pfam ids of ligand residues interacting with a given ligand.

Name: ligand_interacting_ligand_chains_UniProt
Description: UniProt ids of ligand residues interacting with a given ligand.

Name: ligand_interacting_ligand_chains_auth_id
Description: RSCB chain author chain ids of ligand residues interacting with a given ligand.

Name: ligand_interacting_ligand_chains_entity_id
Description: RSCB entity ids of ligands interacting with a given ligand

Name: ligand_interacting_ligand_chains_length
Description: Whole-ligand residues count (not just pocket) of each of the ligands interacting with a given ligand.

Name: ligand_interacting_ligand_chains_num_residues
Description: Number of residues of each of the ligands interacting with a given ligand.

Name: ligand_is_artifact
Description: Indicator of whether a ligand is an artifact

Name: ligand_is_cofactor
Description: Indicator of whether a ligand  is a cofactor

Name: ligand_is_covalent
Description: Indicator of whether a ligand  is a covalent ligand

Name: ligand_is_fragment
Description: Indicator of whether a ligand  is a fragment

Name: ligand_is_invalid
Description: Indicator of whether a ligand  is an invalid ligand

Name: ligand_is_ion
Description: Indicator of whether a ligand  is an ion

Name: ligand_is_kinase_inhibitor
Description: Indicator of whether a ligand  is a kinase inhibitor

Name: ligand_is_lipinski
Description: Indicator of whether a ligand  passes lipinski criteria

Name: ligand_is_oligo
Description: Indicator of whether a ligand  is an oligopeptide, oligosaccharide or oligopeptide.

Name: ligand_is_other
Description: Indicator of whether a ligand type is not any of small molecule, ion, cofactor, oligopeptide, oligosaccharide or oligopeptide.

Name: ligand_num_hba
Description: Number of hydrogen bond acceptor of a ligand of interest

Name: ligand_num_hbd
Description: Number of hydrogen bond donor of a ligand of interest

Name: ligand_num_heavy_atoms
Description: Heavy atom count of a ligand of interest

Name: ligand_num_interacting_residues
Description: Number of interacting residues with ligand of interest

Name: ligand_num_interactions
Description: Interaction count with ligand of interest

Name: ligand_num_missing_neighboring_ppi_residues
Description: Number of missing neighboring protein-protein interface residues within 8 Å of ligand of interest

Name: ligand_num_missing_pli_interface_residues
Description: Number of missing neighboring protein-ligand interface residues within 8 Å of ligand of interest

Name: ligand_num_neighboring_ppi_atoms_within_4A_of_gap
Description: Number of missing neighboring protein-protein interface atoms within 4 Å of ligand of interest

Name: ligand_num_neighboring_ppi_atoms_within_8A_of_gap
Description: Number of missing neighboring protein-protein interface atoms within 8 Å of ligand of interest

Name: ligand_num_neighboring_residues
Description: Number of neighboring residues within 6 Å of ligand of interest.

Name: ligand_num_pli_atoms_within_4A_of_gap
Description: Number of missing neighboring protein-ligand interface atoms within 4 Å of ligand of interest

Name: ligand_num_pli_atoms_within_8A_of_gap
Description: Number of missing neighboring protein-ligand interface atoms within 4 Å of ligand of interest

Name: ligand_num_rings
Description: Number of rings in a ligand of interest.

Name: ligand_num_rot_bonds
Description: Number of rotatable bonds in a ligand of interest.

Name: ligand_plip_type
Description: Ligand type assigned by PLIP

Name: ligand_qed
Description: Ligand QED, a measure of drug-likeness see. https://www.rdkit.org/new_docs/source/rdkit.Chem.QED.html

Name: ligand_rdkit_canonical_smiles
Description: rdkit canonical smiles

Name: ligand_resolved_smiles
Description: Resolved smiles that captures all ligand atoms, pulled directly from https://www.wwpdb.org/data/ccd

Name: ligand_smiles
Description: Ligand smiles, doesn't account for missing atoms

Name: ligand_unique_ccd_code
Description: Ligand representative CCD code after de-duplicating

Name: ligand_num_unresolved_heavy_atoms
Description: Number of unresolved heavy atoms in a ligand
